name: vspacecode
description: Spacemacs like keybindings for Visual Studio Code

vspacecode.magitRefBindings.markdownDescription: The bindings of magit ref menu

bindings.name: Show all buffers in active window
Show active file in tree/explorer view
Copy path of active file with line and column
Copy directory path of the active file
Copy path of active file with line
Copy relative path of active file with line and column
Copy relative directory path of the active file
Copy relative path of active file with line
Copy filename without extension of active file
Copy relative path of active file
Show goal type, context and inferred type (simplified)
Connect to REPL server for project
Go to the current focus location
View the proof-state at the cursor position
Toggle display of all basic low level contents
Toggle display of existential variable instances
Toggle display of all lowLevel contents
Toggle display of raw matching expressions
Toggle test coverage in current package
Enable compiled mode for the debugger
Set current compiled modules/functions as default
Disable compiled mode for the debugger
Clear all inline results in editor
Execute block or selection in REPL
Execute code cell in REPL and move
Execute code in REPL and move
Search all references in side bar
Fuzzy search with selection in current buffer
Maximize window and hide side bar

vspacecode.bindingOverrides.markdownDescription: Overrides bindings of the (default) space key

steps.title: Setting up
steps.description:
This step will set up all the necessary configuration for VSpaceCode.
[Configure for you](command:vspacecode.configure)

scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test-node && npm run test-web
